description.s_description:
*Main tasks* 
. Installing and configuring computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers, and scanners
. Monitoring and maintaining computer systems and networks
. Responding in a timely manner to service issues and requests
. Providing technical support across the company
. Repairing and replacing equipment as necessary

*Qualifications*
·  At least Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information technology or similar
·  3-4 years of experience as an IT support
·  English level: B2
·  Able to work in a shift including weekend
·  Team player – Problem solver – Patient 

Start date: May 4th, 2022
Location: Antananarivo - Ampefiloha

CV and Cover letter should be in English!!
